opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Green v. Maynard, Director, South Carolina Department of Corrections

opinion:
536 U.S. 980

GREEN
v.
MAYNARD, DIRECTOR, SOUTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS.

No. 02-5648 (02A103).

Supreme Court of the United States.

August 23, 2002.

1

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to THE CHIEF JUSTICE, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 349 S. C. 535, 564 S. E. 2d 83.
